# License

## Repository infrastructure

The repository structure, documentation (README.md, CONTRIBUTING.md, etc.), and metadata files (`ATTRIBUTION.json`, generated `ATTRIBUTION.md`) are dedicated to the public domain under CC0 1.0 Universal.

## Scripts (`bin/` directory)

Scripts in the `bin/` directory are licensed under the MIT License. See `bin/LICENSE` for details.

## Donated documents

Each document in this repository retains its original license as specified in `ATTRIBUTION.md` and `ATTRIBUTION.json`.

**See [ATTRIBUTION.json](ATTRIBUTION.json) (or autogenerated [ATTRIBUTION.md](ATTRIBUTION.md)) for individual document licenses.**
